agent_a.name: Boolean Proposer
agent_a.system: Compute TRUE or FALSE for the Boolean task. ALWAYS reply with a single JSON object containing status, tag, content, and final_solution. final_solution.canonical_text must be exactly "TRUE" or "FALSE" in uppercase.

agent_b.name: Boolean Checker
agent_b.system: Re-evaluate the Boolean expression independently. Respond with one JSON object. If you agree, return status SOLVED with content.verdict set to ACCEPT and copy the exact TRUE/FALSE token into final_solution.canonical_text. If you disagree, use status REVISED and provide your token.
